Name: Flying Slime!
About the game: * Flying Slime ! Developer’s Game Description Hello, we’re SHB Soft. Flying Slime! is a 2D Platform Game that moves Slime to the target point through mouse manipulation(Drag the mouse like a bow and fire). It can be played in Windows and only supports single play. In Flying Slime! we tried to provide users with cute pixel graphics and tranquil sound. But unlike the cute image, it is a difficult game and requires high concentration and control. Even users who are confident in mouse control will find it difficult, and later in the game, they will start to feel pain their fingers. We tried to provide users with a difficult challenge while also providing them with a high sense of accomplishment and fun. Flying Slime! has four stages in spring, summer, fall, and winter. Each stage is made up of 20 sectors. The image graphics and sounds of each stage are configured to the concept of that stage, and of course, as the stage moves on, the difficulty increases. We hope it will be an interesting experience. Thank you.
